title: Off-balance
content:
The endless little imaginary stories
That creep up involuntarily
Like creepers climbing all over
Your neatly laid garden
When someone comes
And clips off a leaf.
It is then that you ought to look at the sun
And all that is brought to life
Again and again
Under its warm lasting light

title: Imprudent
content:
I wish to not measure
With a tape
Every inch and corner
Of my living life
To forge into
Pristine preciseness.
Although,
I do measure
As I experiment
Make and break
A protocol
And let the poet
Do the rest.

title: Narration that took me by surprise
content:
Depending on who you are,
I can tell the same story
effortlessly when the words themselves wouldn't weigh
too much
or
thoughtfully when the words would quickly adjust
themselves to my perception of your reception
or
excitedly when the words would race to the edge of my
lips and quickly escalate to something exquisite
And I will remember you
By the story you conjured out of me

title: Somewhere really close to your heart
content:
If you have never heard of it,
I will never pass up an opportunity,
To tell you that something, knowing that
That could have possibly changed
the entire trajectory of your life.
(because I believe it would)
(and just what are the odds!)
Like I almost owe it to you,
And how I would wrong the Universe,
And you, if I didn't
I ought to place such a beautiful thing,
Somewhere really close to your heart
(You see, it's only fitting)

title: Invitation to think
content: In retrospect, I feel the best conversations I have had were almost always based on questions that felt like an invitation to think.

title: Museum of memories (MoMemo)
content: Walking through places as a free ticket to cherished memories :)
